content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window to the north and noticed a light in the distance at a low level, i thought it was a plane or copter coming in for a landing at kent county airport as i live near by, and was waiting for it to vear to the east, but it didn't, it just sat there, i went and sat down at my computer for about 10 minutes and when i got up and looked again, it was still there in the same place and after watching it for a few minutes, it blinked out. what even more chilling is that earlier today i looked up ufo sightings in michigan. we are not alone!
content.summary: I looked out my window and saw a light hovering  for about 15 minutes, that just blinked out, bizzare. i'm not making this up, i swear

content.detailedDescription:
I was on reading pass rd. with my girlfriend - we both saw something glimmering (hovering) at least 2 minutes  with a lot of blue and white lights...  a glimpse of red. it was oval like in shape.  we were facing east towards new mexico. then it looked like it took off straight up and disappeared with in 20 second seemed to be moving at a high rate of speed going up...  my girlfriend took a couple of pictures with her phone and she will upload them here
we are both kinda freaked out...
content.summary: Just caught a glimps of it hovering  then going up disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking in the baseball field at 10:30 at night when i noticed the entire ball being lit gradually to the point it looked it was noon time. i turned my head  upwards to see what it was and i was shocked at the size of the craft.  it gradually descended to about 20 yards above my head.  as i looked up there was one central that was emitting this bright light.  it hovered over my head for 30 seconds.  as i turned my head away from the bright lights i noticed off in the horizon(west) there were three other ships with red lights on top of the ships.  after 30 seconds the craft and the other 3 took off at the same time.  before i could blink my eye they 
were completely out of sight.  nothing man-made moves like that. as i continued my walk i remember thinking that this has to be on the news or in the newspaper the next day. there was absolutely nothing anywhere. i remember like it was yesterday but it was 53 years ago. i wasn't scared or afraid - just curious(i still am today!!!)
content.summary: Ship descended to 20 yds above my head.  bright white lights w/red light on top. there were 3 other ships w/red lights off to the west. all 4 left at same time.

content.detailedDescription:
The time and place were the june 21-23 at the las vegas motor speedway for edc 2013. i saw the object at different points throughout the three nights i was at the event, each sighting was a different time and varied in duration, and multiple times on the second two nights. the object glowed blue and had a small red light that appeared to change which side of the object it appeared on each  time i saw it. the first sighting occurred after the fireworks on the first night because i was still looking at the sky after the spectacular fireworks. my friend and i both saw the object hovering in the distance to the east of the stadium. it appeared further in the distance and moved much differently than the police helicopters that were constantly circling the event throughout the evening. it hovered up, down, left, and right sort of unintelligibly. i speculated that it could be a edc drone videoing the event, but it was  not moving in any sort of way that would have made a good video. it generally seemed to be moving slowly but varied in speed. both my friend and i took a video of the strange glowing object while it hovered. this night's sighting concluded when i believe i saw the object shoot off some sort of flash and then i saw it speed off to the east much faster than it had been moving throughout the sighting. the next morning i saw that the video file on my phone for this sighting had somehow been corrupted. it appeared in my photos, but the file appeared as a grey broken file and when playing was attempted it would display that the video could not play. it was the only video of several i took that night at the event that was corrupted, and was coincidentally the one that had the object in it. i believe my friend still has his video from that night but i am not sure. 

i went into the second night of the event thinking that i would not see the same object that i had seen the previous night, since i had never before seen anything like it in my life. to my surprise i did see it again, on both of the next two nights. i first noticed it again in the east and it again looked to be far outside of the stadium. much further than the helicopters. this night i pointed the object out to multiple friends who also could not begin to guess what could move and look like this object. i also remember pointing it out to a random person, he also could not tell what the object was and was much more interested in the show (as i am sure was the case for the vast majority of the thousands of people at this event) each sighting, the object would hover predominantly up and down with occasional trends to the left and right (never going further from the east than northeast or southeast). i did not see the flash of light or demonstration of speed again though. these multiple sightings concluded when the object would appear to hover low enough that it was out of view, far outside the stadium. i caught multiple videos and photos on my phone from the second and mostly the third night, those videos and photos were not corrupted and are viewable. it is difficult to tell the exact shape from the videos but the blue glow is very visible and the path and speed of its movements are distinct. one video appears unintentionally out of focus, but appears to show the erratic movements of the object. one photo appears to show the shape as a blue saucer, another appears to show the red light but a triangular shaped object, and another (taken closer to dawn) accidentally shows light tracers from the camera not being held still. i will also post a screen shot from my phone showing the corrupted video file that has since disappeared from my phone's memory (with the nsa capabilities, i won't even begin to speculate as to how this video, of all the videos, was unplayable). the last of the videos i am submitting is of what the police helicopters that circled the event looked and moved like to provide a contrast to the object i have described. i won't pretend to know exactly what i saw, but i really have no good explanation for it. the lighting of the object was much brighter than the police helicopters and it moved in a way that a plane could not. i suppose there is always the possibility it was a drone of sorts, but if that were the case then why? to film? with the way it moved, it wouldn't have taken very good video. what other reason would a drone be there for?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange blue ufo encountered over 3 nights edc las vegas 2013

content.detailedDescription: I had just arrived home from work to take the dog out to my back yard. i was facing south at the time of 4:25pm and to my 3 o'clock was a boomerang shaped craft, a pewter black color with an aura around it. hovering in one place then rotating clockwise, moved up then down before disappearing. i thought i was going crazy so i recorded it on my phone. i watched the video a million times to make sure i'm not loosing my mind. i showed my wife and she was shocked. thought ufo's came out at night to avoid being seen?
content.summary: Boomarang shaped rotating counter clockwise then hovering off.

content.detailedDescription: Ok, so i open the door to let dog out and there were four red lights floating over the house across the street. at first i think they are flares then they start moving very slowly toward my house. they fly off making no sound. i turn and see another one coming toward me and then another and another and another. there were 8 in all. i grabbed my phone and took pics but of course they didn't come out very well and i don't know how to get the pics from my regular old phone onto fb. at least i thought to call my mom's house and get them up to see them so i know i am not loosing my mind. it was between 8:30 and 8:45 pm. they had a red light on top and white light on the bottom. kind of shaped like a football. the objects disapeared into a cloud. i was very excited and nervous, i wanted people to see it with me and i was alone. i went to call my family and fumbled with  my phone so much that they only got to see the last of them as they went off into the clouds. my dad commented that they were making no noise. he said something that  low you should be able to hear something. the first four stayed in the shape of a square as it flew off and the others all stayed in a straight line. some of my neighbors also reported that they saw the objects as well.
content.summary: Ok, so i open the door to let dog out and there were four red lights floating over the house across the street. at first i think they are flares then they start moving very slowly toward my house. they fly off  making no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a t.V show on black holes. when this bright green space ship dropped into my living room from the roof. it stayed their for about 25 to 30 seconds. i know it was something i have never seen before. i felt like it was watching tv i looked over at the program and then back at the space ship i felt completly calm not afraid very calm. it then raised up and left. the wall behind it looked strange like it was wavy. during this i listened for my dog to hear if she was barking i could only hear the t.V.No other sound. i believe it was between 11:oo pm and 2or 3am. it was beautiful very green lights.
content.summary: It dropped into my living room stayed their 25 to 30 sec.

content.detailedDescription: Flashes of bright lights in beam form various patterns and speeds
content.summary: Flashes of bright lights in beam form random

content.detailedDescription: At 10:17pm on saturday april 5th me and my girlfriend were coming back from dinner at a steakhouse in the neighboring city of portage indiana. while traveling west down 700 north/cleveland avenue toward our town of hobart i caught something out of the corner of my eye in the southwestern sky. at first i thought it was a falling star but when i actually looked at it,  i knew it wasn't. it was bright green(like a traffic signal), it was coming straight down from very high in the sky and it also slowed down as it came closer to the earth. it looked like it was probably around 5 miles away. i didn't see it land or crash or anything cause i lost track of it behind the tree line. definitely interesting.
content.summary: Bright green light came straight down from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My sister called me and told me to hurry outside and see the dozens of lights in the sky.  she joked that we were being invaded.
i went outside my house and couldn't see anything.  i live on top a mountain and it was cloudy/foggy.  
she was at my mother's house about 8-10 miles away.  she pulled in driveway, got out of her car and noticed the lights immediately.  said they were moving fast and there were dozens at first.  she sent me a pic to see if i could tell what they were.  i have no clue.
content.summary: Lights moving fast in sky

content.detailedDescription: It was a little before 11:30 pm i woke up and went out for a smoke and i walked over to my side yard as i rounded the flowerbed i looked up over the 20x10 cover in the side yard i wasn't in the side i was like 10 feet from the gate i saw a reddish orange light coming from the north west so i ran and yelled for my brother then i went back to where i was and saw another reddish orange light behind the first one i cant say how far apart they were and how high they were so my brother finally made it out that was like 2 minutes from the time i called him once he came out i saw the third one a little further back that the second was from the first and the third was way lower and we stood in front of the car on the drive strips watching and the second one sped up t the first one and they were climbing i cant say how high but you can see them stop some and weave then keep going the third was still low but the light on the side turned on and the third one stopped for a minute so i shined my super bright led flashlight at it for 2 minutes then the light in the side shut off and it started to take off slowly and weaving side to side i couldn't see but it looked like it was matalic so it picked up speed toward the other 2 the other 2 were high and started to flicker out and the 3rd one was still low then flickered out but didn't see then then 3 minutes latter the 3rd one came back on and went further then wen out im trying to write this good i been seeing stuff like this for 4 years where i live but most of the time they park over my neighborhood or over my house i don't know what they want but i sit out allot but most of the time i see them come around around 12am to 2 or 3 am
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: They were a round reddish orange lights pulsating and silent and flickered out

content.detailedDescription: Went out on deck to smoke a cig and looked up and noticed bright pulsating light that moved a constant speed then turned very sharply by 45 degrees and headed north at same speed light turned to dull pulse after turning then went out.
content.summary: Bright pulsating light moving constant speed then sharply turned 45 degrees

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone into my back yard with my dogs & after a few minutes i observed 
a perfectly round ball with internal multiple lights, traveling from the north to the east. there was no sound. i have witnesses ball lightning once and was i certain what i was seeing was not the same. the only similar characteristic of the object to ball lighting was the appearance of energy that was contained inside. my eyes followed it for approximately 15 seconds until it traveled easterly out of sight. i remained outdoors, entertaining my thoughts on this object and approximately 15 minutes later, another or the same object appeared again from the same direction following close to the same path. at this point, i decided to report the sighting to the local police, for the record, and also hoping that others reported it too.
content.summary: 2 sightings apprx 15 mins apart. reported to the local police to go on the record esp. if others reported it

content.detailedDescription: I was in hawaii in december 1986. we landed in hawaii around 630 and arrived at the waikiki marriott hotel around 7pm or 730. we got to our room of the 24 floor facing the south side of the island beach front. we got into the room around 8 to 90 pm i went to the balcony to look for ejecta from haley's comet passing on the north side of the island. i was looking strait up to see any small shooting particles from the comets tail. i did nto observe any think of the comet but looking strait up i saw a huge sphere hovering over the hotel. this object was about 50 to maybe 80 max feet off the top of the hotel. the wind was screaming from south to north strong enough to damage the chandelier in the hotel lobby that had doors open to the beach side and street side. the sphere appeared to be lightly glowing or reflecting the light of the island. i had yelled at my mom and brother to come see this thing and they both witnessed the same object. after about 20 minutes of just staring at it it began to slowly hover against the wind to the south to the beach. as it moved 90 degrees over the waters edge it accelerated instantaneously and was out of sight over the pacific in about 4 to 6 seconds. even over the ocean the object had a faint glow that was visually apparent even with the naked eye. the object never lowered or increased altitude it went from hover to strait out almost like digital perfect no bobble no effect from wind just a flawlessly strait line after hovering for about 20 minutes.
content.summary: Object was a perfect sphere silver white glow or reflecting the street lights or building lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping at 11,200 feet elevation near geneva creek directly south of revenue peak. i was sitting in my tent at around 8:00pm when i just happened to look up and see a star-like light at very high altitude slowly moving across a small portion of the sky. after about 3 seconds it quickly moved in a zigzag with rounded corners pattern aka a sine-wave. it appeared to shoot straight up out of the atmosphere and got dimmer towards the end of the wave pattern as it presumably left the atmosphere. the small, fast moving wave pattern maneuver took less than one second and it was gone.
it happened so fast that after it was over i said to myself "holy sh*t i just saw a ufo!" i hope someday to identify the truth of what it really was.
content.summary: Geneva creek, co i saw star-like light slowly moving in sky then got dimmer as it quickly shot into space in zigzag with rounded corners pattern aka sine-wave

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were driving to my grandmother's. stopped at a red light he noticed a triangular object hovering a few hundred feet above the ground. he asked "do you see that? what is that?" he is a former u.S. marine with knowledge of common aircraft. he had no idea what type of craft it could be. it ascended slowly while rotating to face a new course and slowly began to fly north. we followed it driving around 50mph. it quickly flew in a diagonal line to the left. then flew extremely fast out of sight ascending as it did.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering then traveled before rapidly accelerating to then dissapear

content.detailedDescription: A friend and were deer hunting in indiana. it was a sunday night. we decided to go spot lighting for deer. (which was legal at the time. trying to locate deer on farms we hunted) we had spot lighted a couple farms we hunted on. we spotlighted for roughly 1  -1.5 hours. we were driving east on rt.262. we kept a camper on nixon rd. where we stayed. as we were approaching stewart ridge road. we saw a bright light on top of the hill roughly 1/2 mile away. we thought it someone else spotlighting. then the light was gone. then we observed the ufo right above where our camper was. then the ufo came down the creek right toward my truck. (we were stopped on the bridge on stewart ridge rd). ufo was 35-50ft above creek bed. it wasn't moving fast. it slowly came right over top of my truck and stopped. i was in disbelief. i rolled down my window and there was absolutely no sound. it was approx. 15-20ft round disc. then a bright white light came down ontop of my truck. i put my truck into gear and sped off. my friend kept saying stop and get out. i refused and sped off. as i was speeding off. my friend looked back toward ufo and the light was off and it was moving away toward the west. im sure there are some details i left out. but, this indeed happened!! what we saw was either alien technology or top secret craft. what we saw was not a misidentified helicopter or anything like that. it was a gravity defying flying disc!!!
content.summary: Round object 45ft off ground. absolutely no sound. bright beam of light. decended from 300ft. came west toward us hovered we hit gas and went south on sr road looked back it was gone

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette at parking lot of my building, and i look up to see stars when i saw a huge triangular shape, black with some lights flying over.  the ufo was cruising at very low speed, no noise at 5:00 am, from south to north. i saw for about 15 seconds when i lost the visual because it cross over a 5 store high building. the ufo is very similar to one that i saw on history channel , if i not mistaken lights over phoenix , below attached photos from history channel
content.summary: Triangular shape ufo flying over sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo in broad daylight.
tuesday (25th march). it was a sunny day so i had decided to sit in my garden for a while. i was just relaxing and closing my eyes when i heard a very loud plane. so i opened my eyes and looked up. there where two planes in the sky one going west and one going east.

i was just about to lie back again and close my eyes when i saw the sunlight glinting of something else just below the two planes. looking closely i could not believe what i was seeing. it was a massive metallic long and slightly curved object in the sky. looked the same height as planes which were very high but about four times the size. i watched it fly between the two planes turn slightly (which is when i saw the sun light reflecting off what looked like three large windows). and then it flew straight up out of sight. 

unlike the other planes which had contrails this object had nothing. it was definitely a soild object and it was broad daylight with blue skies. it also traveled far too fast to be some sort of plane. i have to say this has freaked me out a little. i wonder if anybody else saw it.

i
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Daylight metallic object flew between two planes. turned saw what looked like 2 windows. flew straight up and away very fast

content.detailedDescription:
On january 13, 2005 a coworker and i standing outside of walmart in the employee parking lot while warming up our vehicles at about 40 -44 degrees below zero observed a large ufo that at first appeared to come in over ft wainwright then hover south of fairbanks.  after hovering for about a 15 minutes it then moved about 5 degrees to the right and hovered for another 15 minutes.  we left each other and i drove home toward it about 1.4 miles.  at home i viewed it from my balcony. i had a video camera in the house but i was in denial that i was seeing anything unusual and chose not to film it thinking that it must be lights on a nearby building.  after watching it for about 30 minutes i became tired of it and went to sleep.  the next day i realized that there was no building with lights on it that were in the area.  this was truly an over whelming observation and i have had anxiety over it ever since.  with help tom the uaf geophysical institute i was able to take measurements and make measurements.  a weather radar operator helped me take measurements using my gps garmin street pilot.  with all the information we gathered we used trigonometry to determine it's size.  the object appeared to be about 23 miles in width.  but not all of the angles and distances may be accurate.  it was extremely hard to measure since there is nothing on earth that size.  it is an overwhelming truth to have to accept and face.  

with some further research i discovered that a politicians aide was in north pole during that time and took photographs of it. but she is afraid to go public.  i have also learned that a fourth witness saw it from their house on fairchild.  so now there are at least 4 witnesses to it.
content.summary: Trapezoidal object with spires on each side.  multiple lights like maybe between 50 - 100

content.detailedDescription:
last night i saw a ufo it was amazing.  i was sitting on the front porch and a bright blue and red light triangular shape  came zipping across the horizon 100 times faster then any jet i've ever seen here at nellis.  i could not see it after it was blocked by the porch awning and a big tree, so i got up and went down the stairs to the driveway and there it was hovering and darting around a little.  i asked girlfriend who was looking at it too to go get her camera. 

    i stood there and watched it for maybe 30 seconds then gf handed me the camera and as i fumbled to put it in night mode so i could get a picture it dropped straight down very fast somewhere behind sunrise mountain with no sound whatsoever.   the way it moved you could tell it was no plane or helicopter.  up until now i have never witnessed anything like this so close, it was amazing plus with gf seeing it too, i now it was not an imagination thing but i knew that already because it was so clear.  for a moment it felt like it was looking at me standing there.  what i do not know is it's origin, was it man made some secret project from nellis or was it from some other source.
content.summary: Bright ufo zips by

content.detailedDescription: I was inside at 1:30 in the morning, sitting on the couch with the lights on.  out of nowhere, what i can only describe as a beautiful, green, snowflake like, spinning geometric image was "beamed" into my visual frame of reference.  it was like a wheel that slowly turned and sparkled. it started moving towards the window.  naturally, i watched it.  as soon as it got to the window, it disappeared.  outside the window were 2 solid white lights.  it should be noted that out this window there is a small yard, a place to park, a road, and then a big tree with another house right behind it.  you can���t see the sky.  the lights were on either side of an object that had rounded edges and a mostly flat bottom but the top was hard to see because there was a fuzzy fog around the upper half and edges.  the overall shape was difficult to outline due to it being dark outside and illuminated from the inside of my house, but i would say it was a disk with a flat bottom and rounded top.  the object was 5 to 30 feet from the window and 8 to 12 feet off the ground at eye level sitting down inside. i estimate the size to be either 10ft across and 2 foot thick or 30ft across and 5 foot thick. i can only judge its size because there is a tree across the street that takes up the whole window and i compared the width and height to objects in front of the house that i can measure at different relative distances to the vantage point. plus there were obstacles in the way that helped narrow estimates further.  as soon as i was looking at the object, it flashed a pattern of square shaped, hazy, yellow-orange lights along the outside edge.  they were very close but not that bright.  more like a plasma glow than a flashlight. you could see the individual lines of light, like you see in a laser, almost flowing or cascading down over the edge from top to bottom.   the white lights on either side stayed on while the orange lights flashed or quickly pulsed.  imagine the orange lights were numbered (1,2,3,4,5) going from left to right.  the pattern was 1,3,5,3,1,1,2,3,4,5,4,3,2,1.  it was at a speed of a little less than 2 flashes per second.  right after that it shot off to the right with instant acceleration.  1 second after it was out of sight, it faded in like turning up a dimmer switch to the exact spot where it was before it sped away.  after a 3 second pause, all of the lights turned on making it glow orange all around and then it quickly dimmed out until it was gone. the whole experience lasted about 30 seconds and produced no noise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Optical phenomenon followed by the sighting of a disk, at eye level, outside the window.  the disk flashed square lights in a pattern then accelerated away rapidly.

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this sighting for my sister and dad, both of which witnessed the event.  they were driving a friend home and saw a triangle shaped craft with three large lights on one side of the triangle hovering above their car.  the craft was approximately 150 feet above the car and made no sound whatsoever.  they did not stop the car and kept driving, the craft continued to hover and slowly dissapeared behind a nearby treeline.  my sister was shook up by the event and call the cops to report it.
content.summary: Triangle craft seen hovering with no sound above car

content.detailedDescription:
So, i didn't actually remember this event until i was around 20 years old. i'm 26 now. i was having a discussion with my friends about ufos, and i all i could remember about any ufos was some pretty uneventful ufo stuff. nothing really all that interesting. 

but then..Later on that night, when i was meditating, all of a sudden i kept having these weird broken memories of events. eventually after a few days of continouslly thinking about it, i was able to remember most of it...Sort of.

so it was some time in winter, since this is mississppi it doesn't really get that cold until janurary, so i figured some time in janurary or february. i know i was around 10 or 11 years old. so maybe some time in 1999 or 2000. my parents had a mattress on the living room floor, because we didn't have but one heater so everyone slept in the living room to keep warm. i was on the couch, and they were on the mattress, and we were watching some thriller movie on an old vcr. then somehow, the movie was off. the tv was doing that kind of staticy thing like the vcr had turned off. but for some reason i didn't really think too much of it? i also noticed that my parents were asleep, which is what i thought was weird, because they were just awake and were watching the movie. i figured maybe i had fallen asleep, which is possible that i may have, to this day i don't know if that's what happened. but i know i wasn't dreaming at this point. then i heard this really loud humming noise, kind of like a refridgerator running, except about 10 times louder. the vibrations were enough that i remember i could slightly feel them in the floor.

from this point, i don't really remember how i got up to go look out the window, which is right across from the couch i was laying on. since the memory is so distant, i kind of want to say that i may have saw a search light type beam on the road outside the house, but i'm not sure. but i do know what i saw next. i looked up, above the tree which is right outside the window, and i saw a bunch of square-shaped colored lights, in a boomerang shape, above the tree. i think red was the first color i saw on the boomerang wing. the next colors i'm not quite sure it what order, but i remember white, red, blue, green, maybe orange. they were glowing very brightly, kind of like neon. it was so large, that i could only see half the boomerang, the other half was out of sight. it was slowly hovering in a kind of diagonal path coming from i think the northwest, regardless it was upperleft from my position, and it seemed to be going across the house.

after this...I don't know what happened. i remember nothing after this point. hell i didn't even remember this at all until probably 10 years later. i remember everything in so much detail that this wasn't a dream. besides, i've had much weirder dreams than something like this.

since i really don't know what happened, and because of the weird circumstances, i'm kind of afraid i was abducted. i've told quite a few people this story, but only really close friends have i mentioned the abduction part, because i don't want anyone to think i'm crazy. to be honest, with all the damn alien movies these days, the prospect of being abducted scares the hell out of me, so, if i was, at least i'm glad i don't remember.
content.summary: Time lapse event at night when i was a child, witnessed ufo through the window, parents were sleeping, then i don't remember anything else.

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were out on the front porch for a smoke when we spotted an orange glow through the trees. my first thought was that an airplane was on fire! on closer observation, i said, "um, that's not an airplane!" and reached in the door for my binoculars.  this object was coming toward us. through the binoculars it looked like a slowly pulsating orange fireball.  there were no blinking lights as would be seen on other aircraft. the size of the object was larger than the landing light or lights seen on airliners.  
 of late, commercial airline traffic circles from the southeast, turns west and then south, with the completed circling all to our east. most of the airliners going over have their landing lights on for their final approach. the object was near, but not in the flight path previously described. it was farther north. as my partner and i both watched, the object turned east.  the fireball reduced in size by 50%, but not in brightness. suddenly, it changed to a blue star like appearance and picked up speed, heading east. over a few seconds this bluish light faded and appeared to go out. it was too close to have faded because of atmosphere. i feel it deliberately faded from sight.
content.summary: Orange pulsing fireball coming toward us changes then disappears

content.detailedDescription:
On april 2nd, 2014 at approx 2300 hrs i walked outside my backdoor, into my back yard for a cigarette.  a bright slow moving object that looked like it was on fire, (orange and yellow flames) caught my attention.  it was around 45% up and moving from the nw to w.  i yelled for my wife to grab her cell phone and come out.  she tried to record it however,even though it appeared on her screen while shooting it, in replay.. nothing.  i held my hand up at arms length and the object was slightly larger than my fist.  
it seemed to get smaller as it was moving across the sky then abruptly stopped.  it stayed stationary for approx 1-2 minutes then rapidly ascended and disappeared into cloud cover.
initially, i thought it might be a comet however, it moved to slow and then changed directions.
i observed what looked like flames, (orange yellow fingers jumping from the mass.
my wife and i both agreed that it was not a comet, plane,helo or anything else we have ever seen.
content.summary: Went outside for a smoke, saw a firery object traveling across the sky, getting smaller, stopped briefly then changed direction, (up) and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside in lawn chairs with three friends.  this white metallic object came from the south flying low with no sound. my friends jumped up and ran inside, terrified.  i walked to the end of the sidewalk and stared at it for a few minutes as it hovered just above the tree top.  i was very close to it---no mistaking what i saw.  there was no noise.    it was white metallic, oval/disc shaped with a window.   an inner light shown from this window, but i couldn't really see inside. after a few minutes, i realized my friends were still inside and i was alone out there.  i turned to run to the house, and as i did, the ufo flew over the house heading west.  it didn't actually turn, that i saw, it just flew off.
i ran down the street to tell my parents----i didn't know what to think.  they didn't believe me until the next day when a very respected man from the area told them he had also seen a flying saucer the night before, coming from the direction of bluffs and traveling west close to his home about 5 miles away at about the same time.  
this sighting took place in sept. 1966.  i was almost 12 years old, i am now 59.  it has bothered me all of these years, wondering what it was.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Across town street from me, above tree top, it hovered , no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was on the nbvc naval base at 8:30pm on the smoke pit i looked up into the night sky and saw a spot light then saw two white dull orbs go across the night sky with no sound and faster then a plane i watched it go straight then turn towards oxnard ca i could not believe what i saw cause i watch shows like hanger 1 and ancient aliens and i saw in awe i lost sight of the two orbs because they turned towards oxnard ca and i lost sight of the orbs cause they had white dull light i believe i saw a ufo and i looked back into the sky after i lost sight of it to find a plane to confirm what i saw and i found a plane in the sky in the distance so i know i saw something there
content.summary: It flew with no sound and dull lights

content.detailedDescription: the weather was fair & dry. i was driving south on state highway 69 at the city limits of batesville. as i was driving down a steep hill, i noticed what i thought was a private jet headed east as it crossed above the highway. i remember thinking that the craft was flying extremely low for a  jet plane. it appeared to be somewhere between 500 feet-one mile up.It appeared to be a light color. once it crossed the highway it suddenly made a sharp turn to the left which would have been difficult for any aircraft to make. i turned off highway 69 & turned left on to highway 25 headed east. the craft had gone above some hills and was about a mile away when i was able to view it again. at this time it was stationary and was at a higher elevation. it was difficult to watch it very long. i was wanting a better look at it, so i turned left off the highway. however when i started looking for the craft again it was gone. i remember i was very curious about the nature of this craft. i didn't think it was like anything i had seen that low in the sky. i have seen cylindrical objects before in this area, but they were always at a higher altitude. i would estimate the total time of sighting was approximately five minutes.
content.summary: I saw a cylinder shaped craft cross above highway i was driving on & change directions, banking sharply to the left after it crossed the road i was on. then when i turned left & east i saw the craft was up above some hills and was stationary. it was

content.detailedDescription: i was a young boy about 11 at my grandparents me and my grandfather was watching a ball game when he looked out the window and noticed a bright light coming towards us so i went to see and it looked like a bright ball of light when it got over our field it lit the everything up like it was daylight and it was big oval shaped but i didn't hear no motors it was silent and within a blink of an eye it was gone. this happened in varnado louisiana in 90's do yall have anything on this? the event date is incorrect cause i can't remember but i do know it was in the 90's
content.summary: Amazing
